structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Injuries In Line Of Duty; Police Services; Medical Expenses
law.text: The commissioner may authorize the payment, out of any appropriation made for traveling or other expenses of the department, of the reasonable hospital, medical and surgical expenses incurred by any inspector of the department when temporarily or permanently disabled by reason of injuries sustained through no fault of his own while actually performing police service, or while in training.
